Requirements for Applying

REQUIREMENTS: 1. Attach Resume to application 2. Attach 2 Letters of Recommendation

The Educational Technology Data Analyst is a classified bargaining unit position that requires an experienced understanding of student achievement data and the ability to translate data for District use. The incumbent exercises broad discretion in the implementation of District policy, regulations and procedures and may direct the work of clerical classifications. Training is an essential component of the role. The incumbent coordinates and strategizes technology use to best support instruction. The Educational Technology Data Analyst has frequent visible contact with staff, students, vendors and the public.
